magpie.data.utilities.modifiers

Class ClassIsNegativeModifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • magpie.data.utilities.modifiers.BaseDatasetModifier
      • magpie.data.utilities.modifiers.ClassIsNegativeModifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, Options

    public class ClassIsNegativeModifier
extends BaseDatasetModifier
    Modify dataset so that it now contains two classes: class variable was negative, and not. Usage: *No options*
    See Also:
